seo.title: YakShaver developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a YakShaver Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a YakShaver certified developer!

featureItem.headline: Become a Chief Yak Officer
featureItem.text: We recommend that each organization have one (or multiple!) certified Chief Yak Officers (CYO). Each time someone in your organization completes the below steps and receives a certification, your organization will receive 50 credits (valued at $25).

pageBlocks.body:
### You will need to set up YakShaver, understand the best practices, and do a test Shave in which you answer some questions to verify your understanding.

1\. Join [YakShaver's Discord channel](https://discord.gg/Jp9dyxKFjR) - Leave a message on the #introductions:

* Hi, I am trying out YakShaver for {{ TYPE OF PROJECT }}

2\. In your [YakShaver portal](https://portal.yakshaver.ai/), add a project called 'Northwind' and set the backlog to this public GitHub repo: [https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground](https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground)

* Tip: Check out the Shaving [best practices](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/user-mention-guidelines-in-work-item-descriptions)

3\. Set up a [Windows or Mac screenshot tool](https://yakshaver.ai/docs/recording-work-item-snipping-tool) by following the docs.\
Note: This gives you access to keyboard shortcuts

4. Use YakShaver - do a Shave into the 'Northwind' project. In your recording:

* Show the project's location in the portal, and its backlog
* Demonstrate how you have set up your screen capture tool, and where the videos will go after being recorded
* Explain why you must verbally mention the destination project and why you can't just rely on the screen
* Scenario: A user complains to you that after recording in Teams, they have received no notification from the Yakshaver bot. What is your course of action?
* Scenario: A user reports that their Shave went into the wrong backlog. How do you fix this and educate them to avoid the same mistake in the future?
* Feedback: What is your opinion on YakShaver and what feedback would you like to give the team?

5. We will review your video, and if successful you will receive a badge from [Credly](https://info.credly.com/).
## That's it! Your organization will receive 50 YakShaver credits.
